attributes.action: Raise Minimum Wage for Night Shift Workers.
attributes.additional_details:
Night shifts workers are regularly paid a premium on top of a companies normal wage but for many this is not the case. Since the introduction of the NMW (which was a good thing in general, though it does require some revisions) many night shift workers are now paid the national minimum wage.

I propose that workers who work between the hours of midnight and six o'clock in the morning are paid a mandatory extra £2 per hour above the current national minimum wage.
attributes.background:
Currently the National Minimum wage is the same regardless of the time of day or night you work. 

Staff who work night shift should receive a higher NMW by law.
